title: Episode 154: Randonautica
description:
Your deepest desires. Your biggest questions. For centuries people have turned to religion and ritual to find meaning in life. Then right before the pandemic, a new method emerged, promising a random way to answer specific questions. Is it truly providing direction or just taking its users for a ride?


Please consider supporting the companies that support us!

-Right now, Sinisterhood listeners can get 15% off their Raycon order at buyracon.com/sinister 
-Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND two free pillows for our listeners at Helixsleep.com/creepy
-BetterHelp - Get 10% off your first month at betterhelp.com/SINISTER. Join the over 1,000,000 people who have taken charge of their mental health with the help of an experienced professional
-Smart and Sass - Smartass & Sass is a monthly subscription box that brings snark and sass right to your door. Go to www.smartassandsass.com and use code CREEPY for 25% off your first subscription!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
